nodes.bodyText: I think we need to replace all azconfig_docs / appconfig links with links to acs

nodes.bodyText: Let's rename this back to accessKey, it's not a token but the AccessKey from the portal
CommunicationUserCredential actually takes a user access token, not the accessKey. This change here should be reverted, sorry about the confusion.
Oh whoops that was my bad, will revert in next commit!

nodes.bodyText:
Same here, Chat takes a token, not the access key.
(Look out for CommunicationUserCredential which always wraps a token)
